column1:
NOTE 1:  One-way delay from 5G IoT device to backend system. The distance between the two is below 40 km (city range). 
NOTE 2:  It is the typical connection density in today city environment. With the evolution from centralised meters to socket meters in the home, the connection density is 
expected to increase 5 to 10 times.
